department: Foreign Affairs, Trade And Development (Department Of)
short_summary: The Department of Foreign Affairs, Trade and Development (DFATD) is establishing the PS752 Commemorative Scholarship Programs to pay tribute to the accomplished academics and large number of students who contributed to the Canadian post-secondary community and who were among the 176 victims who perished in the downing PS752.
description: The Department of Foreign Affairs, Trade and Development (DFATD) is establishing the PS752 Commemorative Scholarship Programs to pay tribute to the accomplished academics and large number of students who contributed to the Canadian post-secondary community and who were among the 176 victims who perished in the downing PS752.
full_summary:
:Tender Announcement for Scholarship Administrative Services for the PS752 Commemorative Scholarship Program
=====================================================================================

**Tender Details**
----------------

  * **Title (English/French)**: Scholarship Administrative Services for the PS752 Commemorative Scholarship Program / Services administratifs des bourses d’études du Programme de bourses d’études commémoratives du vol PS752
  * **Reference Number (English/French)**: PW-23-01020306 / numéro de référence : PW-23-01020306
  * **Amendment Number (English/French)**: 1 / numéro de modification : 1
  * **Solicitation Number (English/French)**: 23-229586 / numéro de sollicitation : 23-229586

**Notice Date**
------------

  * **Publication Date (English/French)**: January 20, 2023 / date de mise en ligne : 20 janvier 2023
  * **Tender Closing Date (English/French)**: February 10, 2023 at 14:00:00 / date limite d'appel d'offres: 10 février 2023, 14:00:00

**Contract Details**
----------------

  * **GSIN/NIBS Description (English/French)**: Human Resource Services, Business Consulting/Change Management; Project Management Services / Services aux ressources humaines; Services-conseil en affaire /Services de gestion du changement; Service de gestion de projets
  * **Trade Agreements (English/French)**: Canada-Panama Free Trade Agreement; Canada-Chile Free Trade Agreement (CCFTA); Canada-Honduras Free Trade Agreement; Canada-UK Trade Continuity Agreement (Canada-UK TCA); Canada-Colombia Free Trade Agreement; Canada-Peru Free Trade Agreement (CPFTA); World Trade Organization Agreement on Government Procurement (WTO GPA); Canadian Free Trade Agreement (CFTA); Canada-Korea Free Trade Agreement (CKFTA); Canada-Ukraine Free Trade Agreement (CUFTA) / Accord de libre-échange Canada-Panama; Accord de libre-échange Canada-Chili (ALECC); Accord de libre-échange Canada-Honduras; Accord de continuité commerciale Canada-Royaume-Uni (ACC Canada-Royaume-Uni); Accord de libre-échange Canada-Colombie; Accord de libre-échange Canada-Pérou (ALECP);
